thread.title: Carlos Rodriguez / Quality Live Scan
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Carlos Rodriguez / Quality Live Scan

author: Carlos Rodriguez / Quality Live Scan
title: Carlos Rodriguez / Quality Live Scan
text: My Customer Service Rep is Michael at ext.258. I don't deal with anyone but him. He goes above and beyond. I was having a bad day dealing with Bank Customer Service Reps. The last thing I wanted to do was deal with Merchant One's Customer Serve Rep.. but Thank God for Michael. He made me feel like I was talking to a friend. He assured me that he would stay on top of my problem and he did!! Thank you Michael for all your help!!
